title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29ââ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&Aâs.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvinâs lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. Unboxed Demo - One Ride 

Unmatched fun on each trail. The carbon frame model has a lightweight and superior reactivity behavior. Besides the power, the motor's strengths are its quietness and smoothness pedalling even when the motor is off.

Installed on the XTF 1.6 CARBON SPORT is the NEW BROSE S MAG MOTOR, designed for the most competitive riders. THE BEST ELECTRIC MOTOR FOR E-MTB OF 2019 (*) Its compactness, low weight (only 2.8kg), instant power and more control on steep terrain, no pedaling resistance even with the motor off. Extremely quiet with no vibrations and a maximum torque of 90Nm (the best performing on the market).

text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteePrices From R24,999. text: SPRINGBOK E-MTB HARDTAILRESERVE YOURS.DELIVERY DOOR-TO-DOOR BEFORE 25 DECEMBER 2022 TO ALL MAJOR CITIES* AND TOWNS*( *REMOTE AREA DELIVERIES: ADDITIONAL COURIER FEES MAY BE ADDED AT TIME OF DELIVERY)Consider Financing your Springbok with Yonda starting at R1089 per month.Model Name : SPRINGBOK (Hardtail e-mountain bike)Choose from 27.5" or 29" .Inspired by the Beauty, Strength and Agility of the SPRINGBOK.#1 The FrameMaterial : Alloy 6061Artwork: High quality enamel gloss with anti-rust treatment . Green and Black with White trims.Wheel / Fork type and size : 27.5" or 29"EU Frame safety standard-tested : EN15194.Available Sizes to choose from : Medium 17" , Large 19" , Extra large 21"#2 The MotorMotor is Protected inside the frame from outdoor elements - rain , mud ,direct sunlight and potential knocks from rocks or other objects during riding.Two protective alloy plates - one on either side of the frame/motor are removable for motor maintenance.Motor housing has Air flow holes on the underside of the frame ensuring an even flow of cool air during riding.Motor Plates further protect against salt spray & water splash - ideal for coastal regions.BBS and BBSHD motors are known to be notoriously quiet and torquey.Smooth Ride: Motors can be re-programmed from factory default settings to your own customizable parameters. This is one of the beauties of such a versatile ebike kit : the ability to Re-programme the settings to configures one's own personal preferences.Motor Fine-tuning : Riders own preferences for power, speed , pedal assist ( each of the 9 levels of PAS may be adjusted ) . Via a programming tool to suit each riders style and preferences.Motor swap : Swap out and upgrade or downsize motors as required and as your needs change.Choice of 3 Motors: Choose the motor for your SPRINGBOK that best suits you:A) Truck Run 250w Mid DriveTorque 70nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS). Average speed 25-28 km/h.If you are under 90 kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance on steep hills*(B) Bafang BBS02B 500w Mid DriveTorque 85nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS). Average speed 32km/h.Fully reprogrammable parameters - configure to your own riding preferences.If you are under 110kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance on steep hills*(C) Bafang BBSHD 1000w M615 Mid drive.Fully reprogrammable parameters - configure to your own riding preferences160nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS) . Average speed 45km/h.Freedom to ride at wider range of levels of power low ~ high.If you are under 160kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance even on the steepest of hills*

title: 2018 Yt Tues Pro Race Carbon - XL
text:
Selling my 2018 Yt Tues Carbon in XL frame size. (Sized closer to a Large)

I bought this bike in April of 2021 and it was still BRAND NEW and UNOPENED from the factory in its original box and disassembled. 
Everything on the bike is carbon. The frame, swingarm, wheels, handlebars, cranks, derailleur, shifter even the seatpost. The bike weighs about 15.4kgs without pedals.


I had about 10-12 occasions of bike park riding on it at Highland Bike Park in New Hampshire, USA. Also 1 day at Hellsend, Stellenbosch, and that's it. The bike still has its OEM signature tyres on as 'proof' of the mileage(or lack thereof)

This puppy also has had a full service done by TheBikePark in Constantia Uitsig and both fork and shock has been serviced by Omnico (still have the receipts). It has not been ridden since.

Included are some extras:
E*thirteen valves for tubeless setup
Factory ODI AG signature grips
Extra E*thirteen crank shoes
ODI race number board
Crank Bros. Stamp 7 pedals(with spare pins)
AM Camo frame protection on top tube, shock pivot and swingarm
and the owners manuals.

Also have a bunch of gear to sell separately(too much to mention) I'm 184cm and just about 80kg.

Price is firm, I'm in no rush to sell, I'm just doing it a great disservice by not letting it shred as it was meant to.

Cheers, Marten

title: ELECTRIC BIKE CONVERSIONS | E-BIKE KITS | ELECTRIC BICYCLES | CONVERT YOUR BICYCLE TO ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikes built in SA . We personalize e-bikes for people by focusing on one's desired riding experience. E-bikes individually built to satisfy different forms of adventure or exercise. Custom-built E-bikes designed for Farm roads,beaches,sand dunes, mountains or road. And the conversion of existing bicycles to electric to ensure the perfect combination of comfort and power to optimize your riding performance.Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.E-bikes built one at a time to ensure each person's individual needs are met for :1. Type of terrain.2. Torque.3. Speed.4. Range.5. Frame size.6. Weight.7. Riding preferences .Specialized e-bikes built for different types of exploration and performance - Fishing adventures, coastal beach riding, mountains and river beds, farm jeep tracks, forest trails , downhill , single tracks . Whether it's a hardtail or soft tail full susp our team custom-builds e-bikes for people's specific needs.We 1st find out what'll suit you best:Your weight ( for right e-bike motor system)Your height ( right frame size )Your own individual riding preferences for comfort ( saddle, handlebars , stem , pedals ) and convenience (carriers,bags,gear/accessories)WHAT WE LEARNT AFTER 15 YEARS OF CONVERTING BICYCLES TO ELECTRIC:1. SUPPORTS SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused.Why not turn it into adventures and a new desire to ride again?Make valuable use of something that already exists by upgrading it to an electric bicycle.2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONYour bicycle professionally converted to electric by a team who has over 10 years experience in electric bike building over 30 years in bicycle building and servicing .In 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued using our quality Int'l EU standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.Careful consideration of your weight, height, terrain and riding preferences and with our guidance you get to choose right from the start the power and range that best suits you.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintainand service your e-bike.Your e-bike is compatible with most batteries and bicyle components in the market and therefore when it comes to the time when you need to replace anything you have a wider choice.100% Satisfaction & Money Back Guarantee

title: ELECTRIC BICYCLES | E-BIKES | KEEP UP WITH YOUR PARTNER ON RIDES | EBIKE SOUTH AFRICA | EMTB
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteePrices From R24,999. title: ZERO 8X Compact Dual Suspension Dual Motor E-Scooter
text:
The ZERO 8X is a powerful, dual suspension, dual drive electric scooter that can reach a speed of 50 km/hwith a range of 80 km on one charge.
The 8 x 3.5 inch tires are honeycombed solid tires which does not require any air inflation (hence no risk of punctures) but yet achieves a nice comfortable bounce similar to air/pneumatic tires.
Equipped with 2 front and 2 rear LED lights with under chassis lights, the ZERO 8X has a flood of lights that makes night riding safe and visible.
The scooter was purchased in March this year and literally been used very seldom and is practically in a brand new condition.
Comes with the original box, charger and accessories.
Please feel free to contact me if interested. The price is not negotiable. For more details follow the link below.
https://youtu.be/M7R3Ru0VtBs
